arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola indicates ‘very important’ development for Fulham’s squad this season
arts.sum: We've been working with the thought that Raul Jimenez is going to start.” ‘They can use a lot of players there’

arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola insists it is ‘too early’ to read into Fulham’s form
arts.sum: Wins and points matter the most, but narratives can flip and flop far too easily for the liking of Andoni Iraola at this stage of the season. We had the same points home and away, I think 28 and 28.

arts.ttl: Marco Silva summarises Bournemouth as being a ‘very physical’ outfit
arts.sum: “Strong, direct game, and the way they prepare and challenge second balls, they are really on it, and from that moment they are able to build their attacking moments with their speed and pace.” And when I say physical side, not talking about the size of the team, but physical the way they approach, physical the way they challenge every single moment of the game.”

arts.ttl: USMNT squad: Antonee Robinson returns as Pochettino calls up 26 for friendlies
arts.sum: Tyler Adams left off US squad for next Fifa window Team will play against Ecuador and Australia Mauricio Pochettino has named a 26-player roster for the US men’s national team’s upcoming friendlies against Ecuador and Australia that includes many familiar names – and has one very notable omission. Bournemouth midfielder Tyler Adams, a usual mainstay of the squad who captained the US at the 2022 World Cup, is not included. Adams has not been disclosed as having an injury and has been in great form for Bournemouth to start the Premier League season. Pochettino is expected to address the player’s absence in a press conference later on Thursday. Continue reading...
